ShaderNodePreset.Description:
Glint - make highlights bloom into stars
Demo: http://youtube.com/watch?v=0Xa8L4fkPwU
lewis@lewissaunders.com
ShaderNodePreset.Name: Glint

Uniform.Name: barrel
Uniform.Tooltip: Bend stars around center of frame

Uniform.Name: aspect
Uniform.Tooltip: Stretch stars for anamorphic glints

Uniform.Name: dispersioncycles
Uniform.Tooltip: How many complete rainbows fit along each ray

Uniform.Name: saturation
Uniform.Tooltip: How much star colour comes from the underlying image

Uniform.Name: twirl
Uniform.Tooltip: Bend the arms of the stars

Uniform.Name: gain
Uniform.Tooltip: Overall brightness of stars

Uniform.Name: screen
Uniform.Tooltip: Screens the glints over the image instead of simply adding them

Uniform.Name: aa
Uniform.Tooltip: Increase to avoid stepping artifacts

Uniform.Name: falloff
Uniform.Tooltip: Dissolves away ends of rays

Uniform.Name: dispersionoffset
Uniform.Tooltip: Hue-clock the dispersion rainbows

Uniform.Name: threshold
Uniform.Tooltip: Highlights darker than this are ignored

Uniform.Name: barrelbend
Uniform.Tooltip: Bendiness of barrel distortion

Uniform.Name: dispersion
Uniform.Tooltip: How much the stars change colour along their arms

Uniform.Name: tint
Uniform.Tooltip: Tint the stars towards this colour

Uniform.Name: spin
Uniform.Tooltip: Rotate the stars

Uniform.Name: size
Uniform.Tooltip: Size of the stars

Uniform.Name: rays
Uniform.Tooltip: How many points each star has

Uniform.Name: usematte
Uniform.Tooltip: Generate glints only from highlights inside the matte; the matte can also be RGB to selectively tint the stars

Uniform.Name: useblendmatte
Uniform.Tooltip: Only processes pixels inside the matte - this is really fast for small mattes, but glints will be cut off at the matte edge

Uniform.Name: outputglints
Uniform.Tooltip: Output just the glints on black

Uniform.Name: extrasize
Uniform.Tooltip: Extra multiplier on size if you want extra big glints - it will get slow, be careful!

Uniform.Name: extrarays
Uniform.Tooltip: Extra multiplier on ray count if you want many more ray arms - it will get slow, be careful!
